field.label: Enable Maltrail Sensor
field.help: This will activate the Sensor. Do not forget to enable the local server mode or send the logs to a remote server.

field.label: Use Heuristics
field.help: Whether to enable or disable the usage or heuristic detection.

field.label: Check Hostheaders
field.help: Check values in Host header (along with standard non-HTTP checks) for malicious DNS trails.

field.label: Update Period
field.help: Time in seconds how often to refresh trails.

field.label: Monitor Interface
field.help: List of interface to listen on, none means listen on all interfaces.

field.label: Whitelist
field.help: Here you can whitelist IP addresses or domains.

field.label: Capture All
field.help: This will look into all IPv4 and IPv6 traffic. If disabled it will only look for traffic for icmp, udp, tcp syn packets and on known HTTP ports.

field.label: Capture Buffer Size
field.help: Size of the ring buffer (in MB) to memory-map into the sensor processes for sharing captured network traffic. An undersized buffer may reduce detection rates. Defaults to 10% of available RAM when left blank.

field.label: Remote Server
field.help: IP address of the remote logging server.

field.label: Syslog Server
field.help: IP address of the remote syslog server.
